Articles.Content:
Trying to make a high AR wing straight, but no matter how hard I tried it was impossible to make it perfectly straight

The Aero/Procedural window when editing a wing uses slidebars for adjustment. However, the slidebar is very much "analog", e.g. number showing 0.15 may range from 0.145~0.155. It is impossible to make a wing perfectly straight

This can be very annoying in some cases, especially when straight wing or precise wing parameters are desired

Not sure if I'm missing some options... Or this is actually not implemented yet, if so, why not make those numbers alongside the slidebar editable so that precise values can be input via keyboard?
